page.title: 01Niton,the Undercliff & Chale
page.content: This area, of outstanding natural beauty,consists primarily of farm- land and downs.{Niton}and{Niton {Undercliff}are twin villages, one situated in a hollow in the downs, the other facing the sea under a great overhang of cliff which runs from Blackgang to Binnel Point. {Niton}is one of the largest Island villages and,in spite of some housing developments, retains much of its old world charm. It is mainly residential and has an excellent range of amenities. {Chale}is a small village tucked under the downs, facing west towards Freshwater.The Lighthouse at St.Catherine's Point is of great interest,as is the original Lighthouse situated on St.Catherine's Hill.Below is the treacherous Chale Bay and the famous{Blackgang Fantasy {Theme Park,}a great tourist attraction
